ygData.subject: Re: Suicide King
ygData.msgSnippet: First of all, to anyone with the if this gets me kicked out comments: relax. There has only been one person ever kicked out of NBW, and he was kicked out

Subject: Re: Suicide King

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Yanshosh@...

First of all, to anyone with the "if this gets me kicked out" 
comments: relax. There has only been one person ever kicked out of 
NBW, and he was kicked out because he couldn't comprehend the concept 
of people having their own characters. If you guys sent insultive 
emails for no reason, I would be a bit ticked off, but this has 
reason and its understandable.

Also keep in mind that no moderator (except for me, but that's 
because I manage the NBWRPG eGroups list) can kick anyone out without 
the aproval of the other moderators. So ticking one person off 
wouldn't be enough to get you booted.

My point is: its all fine and well if you're talking someone off when 
you have a reason, and if you're not using offensive language *glares 
at Robo*, but the "if this gets me kicked out" parts are probably the 
most annoying.

Also, I know you guys had reason and that's why I'm calm right now, 
but please keep down all the major insults. If this ends up with a 
flame war over the posting board, I'm gonna have to start moderating 
people. If you guys get replies to your anti-JP posts, reply to those 
replies privately. Thanx.
